RNS Number : 1096S
3i Group PLC
11 November 2021
 

 

3i Group plc: Directorate change

 

3i Group plc announces that with effect from today, 11 November 2021, Lesley Knox, currently a non-executive Director, has been appointed Senior Independent Director in succession to David Hutchison (who as previously announced was appointed as Chairman of the Board with effect from today.)

 

 

-Ends-

 

For further information, contact:

Kathryn van der Kroft                                                             020 7975 3021

Communications Director

 

Silvia Santoro                                                                          020 7975 3258

Investor Relations Director

 

Notes to Editors:

 

About 3i

 

3i is a leading international investment manager focused on mid-market private equity and infrastructure. Its core investment markets are northern Europe and North America. For further information, please visit: www.3i.com.

 

This information is provided by RNS, the news service of the London Stock Exchange. RNS is approved by the Financial Conduct Authority to act as a Primary Information Provider in the United Kingdom. END
